title: LÜZHONG Shoe Stretcher Women, Pair of Shoe Stretcher, Plastic Pair of 4-Way Adjustable Shoe Expander Shoe Tree Widener for Wide Feet Bunions, 45

description: Shoe Stretcher Feature: There are two support holes above stretcher, which can effectively support the front and top of the shoes and make the shoes have more three-dimensional sense. There is slope design on the upper and lower back of the shoes, which will enhance the fitness of the shoe stretcher, reasonably and conforms to the ergonomic structure. Is made of high-quality ABS plastic, water-proof and rust-proof, and will not bend and deform. Our shoe stretcher is smooth,which will not damage your hands and shoes,will not break, and is strong and durable, can be reused for a long tome. Can improve the condition of people who have difficulty wearing shoes due to bunions, calluses and other foot problems. It is especially suitable for office workers, the elderly, and other people. HOW TO USE: Your New Two-Way Shoe Stretcher Enables You to STRETHCH Both the Length & Width of a left or right shoe. For Spot Stretching, simply insert any of the removable 'Bunion & Corn' Plugs in the appropriate holes where relief is required. FOR BESE RESULTS, leave Stretcher in place for at least 24 hours. To REMOVE Stretcher, turn handles Counterclockwise. Suitable for all types of shoes：Our shoe stretcher can be matched with sandals, canvas shoes, basketball shoes, leather shoes, running shoes, pointy shoes and other shoe types. But it doesn't fit women long boots. Package Includes: 2pcs Shoe Stretcher. 8 x bunion plugs 2 x booster pads
